results.title: Copy number amplification of TTPAL promotes cholesterol biosynthesis and esophageal squamous cell carcinoma progression via elevating NSUN2-mediated m5C modification of SREBP2 mRNA.
results.text_hl: Moreover, we validate the efficacy of @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ biosynthesis inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Esophageal_Squamous_Cell_Carcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000077277 @@@ESCC@@@ with high @GENE_TTPAL @GENE_79183 @@@TTPAL@@@ expression.

results.title: Statin Use During Concurrent Chemoradiotherapy With Improved Survival Outcomes in Esophageal Squamous Cell Carcinoma: A Propensity Score-Matched Nationwide Cohort Study.
results.text_hl: In addition, we found that use of @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was associated with better survival outcomes for @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Esophageal_Squamous_Cell_Carcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000077277 @@@ESCC@@@ receiving CCRT.

citations.NLM: Chen WM, Yu YH, Chen M, Shia BC, Wu SY. Statin Use During Concurrent Chemoradiotherapy With Improved Survival Outcomes in Esophageal Squamous Cell Carcinoma: A Propensity Score-Matched Nationwide Cohort Study. J Thorac Oncol. 2023 Apr 20;():. PMID: 37085031

results.title: Simvastatin, but not pravastatin, inhibits the proliferation of esophageal adenocarcinoma and squamous cell carcinoma cells: a cell-molecular study
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Adenocarcinoma @DISEASE_MESH:D000230 @@@Esophageal adenocarcinoma@@@ @CELLLINE_CVCL:1622 @@@OE-19@@@ cells and @<m>DISEASE_Esophageal_Squamous_Cell_Carcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000077277 @@@esophageal squamous cell carcinoma@@@ @CELLLINE_CVCL:6898 @@@Eca-109@@@ cells were treated with different concentrations of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@ for 24 h and 48 h.
